items.title: Norway's crown princess likely needs lung transplant, palace says
items.description: Mette-Marit has pulmonary fibrosis, a disease that stiffens the lungs, making it hard to breathe.

items.title: UN-backed experts say Gaza food supplies improving but 100,000 still in 'catastrophic conditions'
items.description: Israel says the report "doesn't reflect the reality" and ignores the volume of aid entering the Gaza Strip.

items.title: Uganda prison officer sacked for 'politicking' on TikTok
items.description: Ugandan law requires public servants to remain politically neutral and bars them from active politics.

items.title: EU agrees â‚¬90bn loan for Ukraine but without using Russian assets
items.description: EU leaders said the loan would be repayable only when Russia paid reparations for the war.

items.title: South Africa defiant after US threatens 'consequences' over refugee centre raid
items.description: South Africa has accused the US of employing Kenyans without work permits to process refugee applications.
